casebody.data:
Michael Mohammed SALAMI, Plaintiff,
v.
MICHIGAN STATE POLICE, Defendant. SC: 159112
COA: 345905 Supreme Court of Michigan. April 30, 2019

Order

On order of the Court, the motion for immediate consideration is GRANTED. The application for leave to appeal the January 11, 2019 order of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the questions presented should be reviewed by this Court.
